Name: Ark Royal
Motto: Desire n'a pas Repos – "Zeal Does Not Rest"
Displacement:
22,000 long tons (22,000 t) (standard)
27,720 long tons (28,160 t) (deep load)
Length:
800 ft (240 m) overall
721 ft 6 in (219.91 m) waterline
Speed:
30 knots (56 km/h; 35 mph) as designed
31 knots (57 km/h; 36 mph) actual
Range: 7,600 nmi (14,100 km; 8,700 mi) at 20 knots (37 km/h; 23 mph)
Armament:
8 × twin 4.5 in (110 mm) DP guns
4 × quadruple 2-pdr (40 mm (1.57 in)) AA guns[1]
8 × quadruple .50 in (12.7 mm) AA MGs
Armour:
Belt: 4.5 in (11.4 cm)
Deck: 3.5 in (8.9 cm) over boiler rooms and magazines
Aircraft carried:
72 (designed)
50–60 (actual)
1939–1940: 26 × Fairey Swordfish, 24 × Blackburn Skuas
1940–1941: 30 × Fairey Swordfish, 12 × Blackburn Skuas, 12 × Fairey Fulmars
1941: 36 × Fairey Swordfish, 18 × Fairey Fulmars
